item.title: 1-on-1's and why we have them
item.description: In the past I've often been asked on why we are having 1-on-1 meetings. Mostly by people that started to report to me or when I insist that we have them at least every other week. The most frequent questions I get are along the lines of “I don't have any topics”, “what do we talk about in this meeting”, “why so often”? In my own career I've seen many different ways of 1-on-1s.
